alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CHAVES COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Hagerman to near Dexter. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dexter, Hagerman, Lake Arthur, Greenfield and Roswell Correctional Facility. This includes Highway 285 between Mile Markers 83 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Motorists can expect brief but sudden changes in visibility and ponding of water on highways as storms move through the area.
